name: gathio
description: Gathio is a simple and open event organizing platform focused on accessibility and privacy. Users can create and browse events without login, making it suitable for grassroots or casual community event coordination.
features: No-Login Events: Create and browse events without mandatory user registration for frictionless access.
Privacy-Focused: Minimal data collection with no tracking or analytics by default.
Accessibility First: Designed with web accessibility standards for inclusive event coordination.
Simple Interface: Streamlined event creation and browsing with minimal complexity.
Grassroots Organizing: Purpose-built for community groups and casual event coordination.
Event Discovery: Browse upcoming events with filtering and search capabilities.
RSVP Management: Track event attendance without requiring user accounts.
Lightweight Platform: Minimal resource requirements for easy self-hosting on modest infrastructure.
